description: A fresh and zesty salad featuring peppery watercress, tangy beetroot and zingy orange paired with creamy feta cheese and crunchy nuts and cucumber.
name: Quick Watercress, Beetroot & Orange Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place 2 raw beetroot, peeled and cut into chunks, in a roasting tin and sprinkle with 1/2 tablespoon olive oil and 1/2 teaspoon cumin seeds. Roast in a preheated oven, 200째C, for 1520 minutes, until tender. Toss together 80 g watercress, 2 segmented oranges and 1 large carrot, peeled and grated. Divide the salad between 4 plates, then top with the beetroot and 100 g sliced or crumbled goats cheese. Sprinkle over 25 g roughly broken pecan nuts. Whisk together 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 teaspoon clear honey, 1/2 teaspoon Dijon mustard, 1/2 teaspoon freshly chopped rosemary and some pepper, then pour the dressing over the salad.
